unity can go crazy on you, so if you decide to come back to use "unity" after using tweaking tools on any type of gnome desktop (gnome classic, gnome etc), unity in your account may not work properly again (just in your user account alone, not for other users, -- also you may be able to wipe out all .gnome settings and then unity can be fixed like this, but it isnt ideal)
